Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 32nd overall pick, by St. Louis in 1970...
Traded from St. Louis to Cincinnati on 2/13/1970 (Going to CIN: 2B C. Ruiz. Going to STL: RF J. Fuller)...
Injured on 5/2/1970 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 6 days...
Traded from Cincinnati to Baltimore on 3/2/1971 (Going to CIN: P L. Tiant, P M. Pappas, CF F. Alou. Going to BAL: P R. James, P L. Dierker, 2B C. Ruiz, P A. Foster)...
Had first career hit on 5/5/1975, off Dave Debusschere (CHW)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/4/1975, off Mike Davison (MIN)...
